_meanings:
{@--1@} A place, region,
country; house, habitation (<ab>Ved.</ab>).

a
fault in composition; see <ls>S. D. 575.</ls>

{1} pain in half the head,
hemicrania (<ab>Mar.</ab> {#arDaSiSI#}).

{2} greeting kindly or with great
respect.

{2} semicircular 
impression of a finger-nail, 
crescentshaped nail-print; <ls>N. 6. 25.</ls>

that of which
a half belongs to Indra.

half said or uttered; {#rAmaBadra iti#} 
{#arDokte mahArAja#} <ls>U. 1.</ls>

a broken
speech; an interrupted speech.
{1} the rising of the half moon.
a sort of posture in meditation.
reaching to the middle of the thighs.

<ab>N.</ab> of the river Kāverī;
({#snAnAdO gaMgAsnAnArDaPaladAyinI#}); so  
{#°jAhnavI#}.

{1} in the 
middle of the womb.

{2} <ab>N.</ab> of the
rays of the sun.

<ab>N.</ab> of the nine black 
Vasudevas and the nine enemies of 

Viṣṇu.

{1} the half moon, crescent moon;
{#sArDacaMdraM biBarti yaH#} <ls>Ku. 6. 75.</ls>

a
knife or lancet with a single edge
(one of the 20 surgical instruments
mentioned by Suśruta).

a form of Śiva, (half male
and half female).

a measure 
containing half a paṇa.

a kind of pigeon ( 
{#arDenAMgena pArAvata iva#}).

half a watch,
one hour and a half.

{1} sharing a half, entitled
to a half; <ls>Ms. 8. 39.</ls>

{2} a term for a consonant
({#vyaMjanaM cArDamAtrakaM#}).

{2} a night 
containing half a whole day of 24 hours.

Hari having a form half like 
Lakshmī.

the Visarga
sound before {#k, K, p#}, and {#P#}, so called
because its sign is the half of a 
Visarga (H).

<ab>N.</ab> of the followers of Kaṇāda
(arguing half perishableness).

<ab>N.</ab> of a class of metres in
which the 1st and 3rd and 2nd
and 4th lines have the same 
syllables and Gaṇas; such as {#puzpitAgrA#}.

{1} a cultivator, 
ploughman who takes half the crop for his
labour; <ls>Y. 1. 166.</ls>
